name: rhttp
title: rhttp
description: Full-featured HTTP client with environments, variables, and request chaining
author: SebastianJarsve

commands.name: index
commands.title: HTTP Client
commands.description: Create and run HTTP requests with advanced features

preferences.name: preferredEditor
preferences.title: Preferred Editor
preferences.description: The name of the application to open JSON responses in (e.g., 'Visual Studio Code', 'Zed'). Leave blank to use the system default.

preferences.name: disableSSLVerification
preferences.title: Disable SSL Verification
preferences.description: ⚠️ Disable SSL certificate verification. Only use for local development or trusted networks. This makes requests vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks.
preferences.label: Disable SSL verification for all requests

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
